channel.title: Running TTRPG Mysteries
channel.description:
On the Gauntlet Podcast feed we present audio from my talk about mysteries at the rpg table-- plotting, timelines, handling information, table management, and beyond. It's about 50 minutes of talk followed by a Q&A.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/running-ttrpg-mysteries
